subject: Baseball
Minorities
Race and Ethnicity
lead_paragraph: Roberts, the first minority manager in the long history of the franchise, which led the way in integrating baseball, spoke passionately about the responsibility he felt to those who came before him.
snippet: Roberts, the first minority manager in the long history of the franchise, which led the way in integrating baseball, spoke passionately about the responsibility he felt to those who came before him.
